text: Ernest Joseph Beck (December 11, 1931 â€“ December 12, 2024) was an American professional basketball player. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Beck played seven years in the National Basketball Association for the Philadelphia Warriors, St. Louis Hawks, and Syracuse Nationals from 1953 to 1961. Beck died in West Chester, Pennsylvania on December 12, 2024, one day after his 93rd birthday.Ernest Joseph Beck Obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * * Career statistics Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Ernie Beck
